mapper.select: SELECT ROW_NUMBER()OVER(ORDER BY ILBO_LOT desc) AS ROW_NUM, * FROM WORKILBO INNER JOIN ORDERT ON WORKILBO.ORD_CODE = ORDERT.ORD_CODE INNER JOIN FACILITY ON WORKILBO.FAC_CODE = FACILITY.FAC_CODE INNER JOIN PRODUCT ON ORDERT.PROD_CODE = PRODUCT.PROD_CODE INNER JOIN CORP ON PRODUCT.CORP_CODE = CORP.CORP_CODE INNER JOIN TECHIN ON PRODUCT.TECH_NO = TECHIN.TECH_NO INNER JOIN USERT ON WORKILBO.USER_CODE = USERT.USER_CODE where ILBO_STRT between CONCAT(#{sdate},' 00:00') and CONCAT(#{edate},' 23:59') and ILBO_GUBN='A'

SELECT ROW_NUMBER()OVER(ORDER BY IlboDate, IlboStrt) AS ROW_NUM, vWrkPrepare.IlboDate, vWrkPrepare.IlboStrt, vWrkPrepare.IlboEnd, vWrkPrepare.CORP_NAME, vWrkPrepare.PROD_NAME, vWrkPrepare.PROD_NO, vWrkPrepare.PROD_GYU, vWrkPrepare.PROD_JAI, vWrkPrepare.ILBO_SU, vWrkPrepare.USER_NAME, vWrkPrepare.ORD_NAME, vWrkPrepare.ILBO_CODE, vWrkPrepare.ILBO_NO, vWrkPrepare.ORD_CODE, vWrkPrepare.ORD_LOT FROM vWrkPrepare INNER JOIN PRODUCT ON vWrkPrepare.PROD_CODE = PRODUCT.PROD_CODE where ILBO_STRT between #{sdate} and #{edate} ORDER BY IlboDate, IlboStrt

SELECT ROW_NUMBER()OVER(ORDER BY IlboDate, IlboStrt) AS ROW_NUM, vWrkPrepare.IlboDate, vWrkPrepare.IlboStrt, vWrkPrepare.IlboEnd, vWrkPrepare.CORP_NAME, vWrkPrepare.PROD_NAME, vWrkPrepare.PROD_NO, vWrkPrepare.PROD_GYU, vWrkPrepare.PROD_JAI, vWrkPrepare.ILBO_SU, vWrkPrepare.USER_NAME, vWrkPrepare.ORD_NAME, vWrkPrepare.ILBO_CODE, vWrkPrepare.ILBO_NO, vWrkPrepare.ORD_CODE, vWrkPrepare.ORD_LOT FROM vWrkPrepare INNER JOIN PRODUCT ON vWrkPrepare.PROD_CODE = PRODUCT.PROD_CODE where ILBO_STRT between #{sdate} and #{edate}
ORDER BY IlboDate, IlboStrt

SELECT ROW_NUMBER()OVER(ORDER BY ILBO_LOT desc) AS ROW_NUM, * FROM WORKILBO INNER JOIN ORDERT ON WORKILBO.ORD_CODE = ORDERT.ORD_CODE INNER JOIN FACILITY ON WORKILBO.FAC_CODE = FACILITY.FAC_CODE INNER JOIN PRODUCT ON ORDERT.PROD_CODE = PRODUCT.PROD_CODE INNER JOIN CORP ON PRODUCT.CORP_CODE = CORP.CORP_CODE INNER JOIN TECHIN ON PRODUCT.TECH_NO = TECHIN.TECH_NO INNER JOIN USERT ON WORKILBO.USER_CODE = USERT.USER_CODE where ILBO_STRT between CONCAT(#{sdate},' 00:00') and CONCAT(#{edate},' 23:59') and ILBO_GUBN='R'

SELECT ROW_NUMBER()OVER(ORDER BY IlboDate, IlboStrt) AS ROW_NUM, vWrkShot.IlboDate, vWrkShot.IlboStrt, vWrkShot.IlboEnd, vWrkShot.CORP_NAME, vWrkShot.PROD_NAME, vWrkShot.PROD_NO, vWrkShot.PROD_GYU, vWrkShot.PROD_JAI, vWrkShot.ILBO_SU, vWrkShot.USER_NAME,vWrkShot.ORD_NAME, vWrkShot.ILBO_CODE, vWrkShot.ILBO_NO, vWrkShot.ORD_CODE, vWrkShot.ILBO_LOT,vWrkShot.ORD_LOT FROM vWrkShot INNER JOIN PRODUCT ON vWrkShot.PROD_CODE = PRODUCT.PROD_CODE where ILBO_STRT between #{sdate} and #{edate}
ORDER BY IlboDate, IlboStrt

SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY IlboDate, IlboStrt) AS ROW_NUM, vwrksetting.IlboDate AS ilbo_date, vwrksetting.IlboStrt AS ilbo_strt, vwrksetting.IlboEnd AS ilbo_end, vwrksetting.ILBO_LOT, vwrksetting.CORP_NAME, vwrksetting.PROD_NAME, vwrksetting.PROD_NO, vwrksetting.PROD_GYU, vwrksetting.PROD_JAI, vwrksetting.ILBO_SU, vwrksetting.USER_NAME, vwrksetting.ORD_NAME, vwrksetting.ILBO_CODE, vwrksetting.ILBO_NO, vwrksetting.ORD_CODE, vwrksetting.BARCODE, vwrksetting.ORD_LOT FROM vwrksetting INNER JOIN PRODUCT ON vwrksetting.PROD_CODE = PRODUCT.PROD_CODE WHERE ILBO_STRT BETWEEN #{sdate} AND #{edate} ORDER BY IlboDate, IlboStrt

SELECT ROW_NUMBER()OVER(ORDER BY CORP_NAME,PROD_NAME,PROD_NO) AS ROW_NUM, LEFT(CONVERT(nvarchar, WORKILBO.ILBO_STRT, 120), 10) AS IlboDate, FAC_NAME, CORP_NAME, PROD_NAME, PROD_NO, SUM(ILBO_SU) AS ILBO_SU, SUM(ILBO_JUNG) AS ILBO_JUNG, ORD_DANG, SUM(ILBO_SU * ORD_DANG) AS ILBO_MON FROM workilbo inner join ORDERT on ORDERT.ORD_CODE = WORKILBO.ORD_CODE inner join FACILITY on FACILITY.FAC_CODE = WORKILBO.FAC_CODE inner join PRODUCT on ORDERT.PROD_CODE = PRODUCT.PROD_CODE inner join CORP on CORP.CORP_CODE = PRODUCT.CORP_CODE WHERE ILBO_STRT between #{sdate} and #{edate} GROUP BY ILBO_STRT, FAC_NAME, CORP_NAME, PROD_NAME, PROD_NO, ORD_DANG

SELECT FAC_NAME, CORP_NAME, PROD_NAME, PROD_NO, ORD_LOT, ILBO_STRT, CASE WHEN ILBO_END IS NULL THEN '1900-01-01 00:00:00.000' ELSE CONVERT(CHAR(23), ILBO_END, 21) END AS ILBO_END, CASE WHEN DATEDIFF(minute, ILBO_STRT, ILBO_END) IS NULL THEN DATEDIFF ( mi , ILBO_STRT, getdate()) WHEN DATEDIFF(minute, ILBO_STRT, ILBO_END) < 0 THEN DATEDIFF ( mi , ILBO_STRT, getdate()) ELSE CAST(DATEDIFF(minute, ILBO_STRT, ILBO_END) AS VARCHAR(10)) END AS TIME, ILBO_SU, ILBO_JUNG, ORD_DANW, CASE WHEN FAC_DAN='off' THEN 0 ELSE ORD_DANG END AS ORD_DANG, CASE WHEN ORD_DANW = 'KG' THEN ILBO_JUNG * ORD_DANG ELSE ILBO_SU * ORD_DANG END AS MON, ILBO_CODE, ILBO_LOT FROM WORKILBO INNER JOIN FACILITY ON FACILITY.FAC_CODE = WORKILBO.FAC_CODE INNER JOIN ORDERT ON WORKILBO.ORD_CODE = ORDERT.ORD_CODE INNER JOIN PRODUCT ON ORDERT.PROD_CODE = PRODUCT.PROD_CODE INNER JOIN CORP ON PRODUCT.CORP_CODE = CORP.CORP_CODE WHERE fac_dan != 'off' and ILBO_STRT between #{sdate} and #{edate}
ORDER BY FAC_NAME, ILBO_CODE, CORP_NAME, PROD_NAME, PROD_NO,ORD_LOT
